patthana8.14:1.1: Noāsavaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca noāsavo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Noāsavaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nanoāsavo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Noāsavaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca noāsavo ca nanoāsavo ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā. (3)
patthana8.14:2.1: Nanoāsavaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nanoāsavo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.
patthana8.14:3.1: Noāsavañca nanoāsavañca dhammaṃ paṭicca noāsavo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Noāsavañca nanoāsavañca dhammaṃ paṭicca nanoāsavo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Noāsavañca nanoāsavañca dhammaṃ paṭicca noāsavo ca nanoāsavo ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā. (3) (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
patthana8.14:4.1: Hetuyā nava, ārammaṇe nava …pe… vipāke ekaṃ …pe… avigate nava. (Sabbattha vitthāro.)
